query.sfwSql: SELECT * FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION SBC WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=SBC.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLN.PLAN_ID=SBC.PLAN_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_VALUE=SBC.STATUS_VALUE AND SCV.CODE_ID=SBC.STATUS_ID WHERE ISNULL(SBC.IS_CALCULATION_VISIBLE_FLAG,'Y')<>'N' ORDER BY SBC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID desc,SCV.CODE_VALUE_ORDER

Select Service_Purchase_Header_Id,Person_Id,Service_Purchase_Type_Value,Service_Purchase_Type_ID,PRORATED_PSC from SGT_SERVICE_PURCHASE_HEADER Where person_id=@personid and plan_id=@planid Service_Purchase_Type_Value in ('CONS','USRA','UUSL') and Action_Status_Value in ('INPY') and Action_Status_Value in ('APPR','INPY')

DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_FAS_MONTHS WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ERROR WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_OPTIONS WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_OTHER_DIS_BENEFIT WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_PAYEE WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_DEDUCTION_SUMMARY WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_FAS_INDEXING WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_GHDV_DEDUCTION WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_LIFE_DEDUCTION WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_LTC_DEDUCTION WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_MULTIPLIER WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_PAYEE_TAX_WITHHOLDING WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_RHIC_OPTION WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_SERVICE_PURCHASE WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION WHERE BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID

SELECT TOP 1 NUMBER_OF_PAYMENTS FROM SGT_BENEFIT_PROVISION_EXCLUSION WHERE @SUMOFAGE >=MINIMUM_AGE AND @SUMOFAGE <=MAXIMUM_AGE AND EXCLUSION_CALC_PAYMENT_TYPE_VALUE=@EXCLUSIONPAYMENTTYPE AND EFFECTIVE_DATE <=@EFFECTIVE_DATE ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_FAS_MONTHS FAS LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=FAS.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN ON PLN.PLAN_ID=SPA.PLAN_ID WHERE FAS.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=@BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID and FAS_LOGIC_VALUE=@FAS_LOGIC_VALUE ORDER BY YEAR DESC,MONTH DESC

SELECT * FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_PAYEE PAY LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON APP ON APP.PERSON_ID=PAY.PAYEE_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION ORG ON ORG.ORG_ID=PAY.PAYEE_ORG_ID WHERE PAY.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=SBC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID

SELECT TOP 1 BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID FROM (SELECT PAYEE.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID, (SELECT TOP 1 DATA2 FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAYSTAT INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV ON PAYSTAT.STATUS_VALUE=SCV.CODE_VALUE AND PAYSTAT.STATUS_ID=SCV.CODE_ID WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=PAYEE.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) AS PAYEE_STATUS FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PAYEE LEFT JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP ON PAYEE.APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT APPACC ON APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=APPACC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID AND ISNULL(IS_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT_FLAG,'N') ='Y' LEFT JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_CALCULATION DROC (NOLOCK) ON PAYEE.DRO_CALCULATION_ID = DROC.DRO_CALCULATION_ID LEFT JOIN DBO.SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_APPLICATION DROA (NOLOCK) ON PAYEE.DRO_APPLICATION_ID = DROA.DRO_APPLICATION_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT DROAC (NOLOCK) ON DROA.MEMBER_PERSLINK_ID=DROAC.PERSON_ID AND DROA.PLAN_ID=DROAC.PLAN_ID AND DROAC.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE <> 'WTN1'
WHERE case when APPACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL THEN APPACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID else droac.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID end = @PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND payee.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE=@BENEFIT_TYPE) AS INNERTAB WHERE PAYEE_STATUS <> 'CNLD'

SELECT TOP 1 * FROM (SELECT PAYEE.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID, (SELECT TOP 1 DATA2 FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAYSTAT INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV ON PAYSTAT.STATUS_VALUE=SCV.CODE_VALUE AND PAYSTAT.STATUS_ID=SCV.CODE_ID WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=PAYEE.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) AS PAYEE_STATUS FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PAYEE LEFT JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP ON PAYEE.APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT APPACC ON APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=APPACC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID AND ISNULL(IS_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT_FLAG,'N') ='Y' LEFT JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_CALCULATION DROC (NOLOCK) ON PAYEE.DRO_CALCULATION_ID = DROC.DRO_CALCULATION_ID LEFT JOIN DBO.SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_APPLICATION DROA (NOLOCK) ON PAYEE.DRO_APPLICATION_ID = DROA.DRO_APPLICATION_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT DROAC (NOLOCK) ON DROA.MEMBER_PERSLINK_ID=DROAC.PERSON_ID AND DROA.PLAN_ID=DROAC.PLAN_ID AND DROAC.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE <> 'WTN1'
WHERE case when APPACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL THEN APPACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID else droac.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID end = @PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND payee.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE=@BENEFIT_TYPE) AS INNERTAB WHERE PAYEE_STATUS <> 'CNLD'

SELECT * FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PAY WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAY.APPLICATION_ID= APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION CAL WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAY.CALCULATION_ID=CAL.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID AND CAL.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT APPLACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON APPLACC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID AND ISNULL(IS_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT_FLAG,'N') ='Y' INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PERACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=APPLACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_RETIREMENT PAR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PAR.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID --PIR14646 INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=PERACC.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERACC.PLAN_ID= PLN.PLAN_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID,(SELECT TOP 1 STATUS_VALUE FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAYSTAT WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYSTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=PAY.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY PAYSTAT.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC, PAYSTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID DESC) STATUS_VALUE FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PAY WHERE PAY.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE='DISA') AS TEMP ON TEMP.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=PAY.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND TEMP.STATUS_VALUE='RCDS' Where (WORKFLOW_AGE_CONVERSION_FLAG is null or WORKFLOW_AGE_CONVERSION_FLAG = 'N') and (WORKFLOW_RULE_CONVERSION_FLAG is null or WORKFLOW_RULE_CONVERSION_FLAG = 'N') and pln.plan_id in (1,2,20,4,5,26,27,3,29)

SELECT * FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PAY WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK)ON PAY.APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION CAL WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAY.CALCULATION_ID=CAL.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID AND CAL.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT APPACC WITH(NOLOCK)ON APPACC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID AND ISNULL(IS_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT_FLAG,'N') ='Y' INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PERACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=APPACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=PERACC.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERACC.PLAN_ID= PLN.PLAN_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID,(SELECT TOP 1 STATUS_VALUE FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAYSTAT WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYSTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=PAY.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY PAYSTAT.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC, PAYSTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID DESC) STATUS_VALUE FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PAY WHERE PAY.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE='DISA') AS TEMP ON TEMP.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=PAY.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND TEMP.STATUS_VALUE='RCDS' Where (WORKFLOW_AGE_CONVERSION_FLAG is null or WORKFLOW_AGE_CONVERSION_FLAG = 'N')

UPDATE BC SET STATUS_VALUE='PROC', MODIFIED_BY='PERSLink Batch'+' '+ convert(nvarchar,@batchscheduleid), MODIFIED_DATE = GETDATE(), UPDATE_SEQ = UPDATE_SEQ+1 FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION BC INNER JOIN ( SELECT PA.CALCULATION_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PA INNER JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER PHH ON PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=PHH.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PHH.PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID=@PAYMENTSCHEDULEID WHERE PHH.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID IS NOT NULL AND PA.CALCULATION_ID IS NOT NULL ) AS PBA ON BC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID =PBA.CALCULATION_ID WHERE ISNULL(STATUS_VALUE,'') <> 'PROC'
UPDATE BC SET STATUS_VALUE='PROC', MODIFIED_BY='PERSLink Batch'+' '+ convert(nvarchar,@batchscheduleid), MODIFIED_DATE = GETDATE(), UPDATE_SEQ = UPDATE_SEQ+1 FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION BC INNER JOIN ( SELECT BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID FROM SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION WHERE ISNULL(ACTION_STATUS_VALUE,'') = 'VERF' AND ISNULL(STATUS_VALUE,'') = 'PROC' AND (PLAN_ID = 7 OR PLAN_ID = 28 OR PLAN_ID = 30) AND PAYMENT_DATE <= (SELECT PAYMENT_DATE FROM SGT_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID = @PAYMENTSCHEDULEID) -- ADDED ) BA ON BA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = BC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID WHERE ISNULL(BC.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE,'') = 'APPR' and ISNULL(BC.STATUS_VALUE,'') <> 'PROC' AND (PLAN_ID = 7 OR PLAN_ID = 28 OR PLAN_ID = 30)

UPDATE SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_RETIREMENT_CONTRIBUTION SET TRANSFER_FLAG_VALUE = 'C', MODIFIED_BY = @USER_ID ,MODIFIED_DATE = GETDATE() ,UPDATE_SEQ = UPDATE_SEQ + 1 WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = @PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND TRANSFER_FLAG_VALUE IS NULL AND SUBSYSTEM_VALUE <> 'PMNT'

SELECT DISTINCT BC.*, BAPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION BC WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION BA WITH (NOLOCK) ON BC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = BA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT BAPA WITH (NOLOCK) ON BA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = BAPA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID WHERE ISNULL(BAPA.IS_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT_FLAG, 'N') = 'Y' AND BA.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('DENI', 'CANC') AND BAPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = CASE WHEN @PERSONACCOUNTID = -999 THEN BAPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID ELSE @PERSONACCOUNTID END AND BC.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE = 'PAPR' AND (BC.CALCULATION_TYPE_VALUE = 'FNAL' OR BC.CALCULATION_TYPE_VALUE = 'SBST')
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION WHERE PERSON_ID = @PERSONID AND CALCULATION_TYPE_VALUE = 'FNAL' ORDER BY BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID DESC

attribute.sfwCaption: Ssli Or Uniform Income Commencement Age
Minimum Guarentee Amount Non Taxable Amount
Actuarially Adjusted Monthly Single Life Benefit
